name: Fermi Parallax
description:
The game

The Fermi Paradox states that is mathematically impossible that we are alone in the Universe. So why we don't ever meet other species?

Understand why in this minimalist vertical scroller space shooter with cute flat design!

Controls

Spacebar/Square/X/Y

InputActionArrow keys/Left JoystickMoveSpacebar(X on XBox Controller)ShootShift(B on XBox Controller)Dash Patronage

If you are a $5+ Pigdev Patron you can already get the game by using the link below:

https://pigdev.itch.io/fermi-parallax/patreon-access

Price

Fermi Parallax costs $5 currently. For a game with 3 Levels might sound like high price, unless you understand the reason.

It is a part of my design to keep updating my games as time goes, building my universe and its mythology as each game is a piece of the puzzle for the whole story I'm trying to tell.

With $5 you get access to all further updates of Fermi Parallax, with 3 updates already planned. With each major update the price also goes up!
